trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPONREPLICASHOP_00271_TALK_ACTOR<tab>Forgive me, but I'm afraid I cannot do anything without a true Zodiac Weapon Zeta upon which to base my replica. Could you bring one to me?
TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPONREPLICASHOP_00271_MENU_TITLE<tab>Select a Zodiac Weapon Zeta to replicate.
